description: 9-volume panoramic OCT stitching configuration - Cross/Plus pattern layout

subsampling.description: Load every 2nd B-scan for memory optimization (~50% reduction)

1.description: Central reference volume - all neighbors stitch to this

2.description: Right neighbor - overlaps with center volume

3.description: Far right extension - overlaps only with volume 2, not center

4.description: Left neighbor - overlaps with center volume

5.description: Far left extension - overlaps only with volume 4, not center

6.description: Upper neighbor - overlaps with center volume

7.description: Far upper extension - overlaps only with volume 6, not center

8.description: Lower neighbor - overlaps with center volume

9.description: Far lower extension - overlaps only with volume 8, not center

level_1.description: Parallel: All neighbors stitch to center volume

level_2.description: Parallel: All extensions stitch to their respective neighbors
